original_text:
“In that day,” declares the Lord,
    “the king and the officials will lose heart,
the priests will be horrified,
    and the prophets will be appalled.”
korean_text: 여호와의 말씀이니라 그 날에 왕과 지도자들은 낙심할 것이며 제사장들은 놀랄 것이며 선지자들은 깜짝 놀라리라

sentences.original_text: In that day, declares the Lord,
the king and the officials will lose heart,
and the prophets will be appalled.
